channel.title: 317 Client and Source with download links FOR BEGINNERS!
channel.description:
This is pk jad scape client i took it and edited it a lil bit the home is based in edgeville basic delta source and client. I added the ip addess to 127.0.0.1 so just go to EGUI.java and you wil see 127.0.0.1 erase that and put your ip addess then save and compile and your done :D
what i added:
.Gs stance
.Shades (drop all whips and spirit shield)
.fixed d claws so they hit more offten
.Took out some uneeded files
That's about it i didnt do much just did a little so its easier on people. [font=Verdana]plz dont flame this is my first Release... :([/font]
Server link - http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?ke2enzmmn4w
Client link - http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?0tohoyjyyyo

item.title: 317 Client and Source with download links FOR BEGINNERS!
item.dc:creator: @locksmin locksmin
item.description:
@locksmin wrote:

heyman467:

download, needs some work but can be fixed up. nice server nice source. thank you.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 01, 2009, 08:36:20 pm[/size][hr]can anyone give me the dl link to the jdk you need to compile, please

http://www.java.com/en/download/index.jsp

That is the latest java version right there and if the compiler dont work try switching the 13 to a 16 that is in the compiler anymore questions comment and ill reply[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 01, 2009, 09:12:11 pm[/size][hr]If you want me to i can add some diff tele’s for you…like ::shades and ::gwd stuff like that i can do it within a few minutes and i can post the new link on here if you wanted…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 02, 2009, 01:22:46 am[/size][hr]Hey Guys im working on another source and client right now i should have it posted in about a week or so

item.title: 317 Client and Source with download links FOR BEGINNERS!
item.dc:creator: @locksmin locksmin
item.description:
@locksmin wrote:

ugn:

its ok sorry if i was beign mean i just hate delta so much now it lags alot and it have alot of dugs i started a base on devolution and ran it for about 1 month with over 2bill nulls and no lags at all is yea best base devolution so far also had about 60 plays on lolz

Ye its no problem… im Working on another release right now with gs stance and speacial attacks rs style atm… adding some new stuff to it and i will release.
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 01, 2009, 07:51:53 pm[/size][hr][quote=“csstf2, post:5, topic:312034”][size=10pt][size=10pt][size=10pt]Pictures pelase![/size][/size][/size]

Put pictures please!!![/quote]

I dont no how to add pictures yet if you tell me how im sure i will be able to do it

Read full topic
